mapper.select: SELECT rownum as bcnfmNo , c.bcnfm_id , c.book_id , b.book_cover , b.book_cover_path , ( SELECT member_nm FROM member m where m.member_id = b.member_id ) as bcnfm_req_nm , b.book_nm , bcnfm_req_dt , ( SELECT scodes.scode_nm FROM scodes WHERE lcode = 'BC' AND scode = c.bcnfm_st_cd ) as bcnfmStCd , bcnfm_cnfm_dt , ( SELECT member_nm FROM member m where m.member_id = c.bcnfm_cnfmr ) as bcnfm_cnfmr FROM book_confirm c , book b WHERE c.book_id = b.book_id
